meanings.definition: To surpass in wishing or desire.
meanings.sent1: She always outwishes her friends when it comes to birthday presents.
meanings.sent2: He outwishes his siblings for the biggest slice of cake.
meanings.sent3: The little girl outwishes her cat for a new toy.
meanings.sent4: His ambition outwishes his current circumstances.
meanings.sent5: The sun outwishes the moon in brightness.

meanings.definition: To have a greater wish or desire than someone else.
meanings.sent1: My sister outwishes me for a new bike.
meanings.sent2: The puppy outwishes the kitten for attention.
meanings.sent3: The student outwishes the teacher for a longer recess.
meanings.sent4: His hunger outwishes his fear of spiders.
meanings.sent5: The storm outwishes the calm weather.
